grow() run one step of evolution mode: 0: do nothing 1: mutate 2: grow (according to production rules)

Return value 0: done, no problems 1: environmental query queued -1: error

vector<int> LSystemNested::parseMutationProbabilities (  string  mutationProbabilties,
bool  printDebug = DO_DEBUG
)  [virtual]
 

parses the mutation probabilties (in LSystem save file format) into an appropriately structured vector of ints

Parameters:
mutationProbabilities a string representing the mutation probabilities given as pairs contained in ()'s each element in the pair separated by a , the first number in the pair is the probability, the second the type of mutation to apply the probability to

Implements LSystem.
